item.title: Unstructured Data
item.description: Unstructured data is the data that does not follow a specific format. We can also define unstructured data as the information that does not have a pre defined data model or not in a organised manner.Â If 20 percent of the data available to enterprises is structured data, the other 80 percent is unstructured. If there is a chance to analyse this whole data, we can see this world from the different perspective!
